Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Romantic Disillusionment and Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan's initial disillusionment with her life and romantic dreams, her interaction with a skeptical man, and her abrupt departure from the saloon.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Lament
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her dissatisfaction with her current reality and lost dreams in a saloon, engaging in conversation with a skeptical listener.

sub_scenes.title: Abrupt Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan abruptly decides to leave the saloon after the skeptical response, hinting at lingering feelings for Cal Patterson.

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Nan's Distress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the plot of the ghost town's impending demolition for an airport and Nan's emotional reaction upon learning this news.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Ghost Town and Development Plans
sub_scenes.description: Men arrive at Merrick Gulch, revealing plans to build an airport, marking the ghost town's end.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

sub_scenes.title: Distress and Impending Demolition
sub_scenes.description: Characters react emotionally to the demolition plans, especially Nan, who overhears the conversation and is visibly distressed.

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Misunderstanding and Deeper Feelings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Nan and Cal's conversation about romance, misjudgment, and deeper feelings as they navigate their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Understanding and Misjudgment
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss romantic feelings, with Nan acknowledging her misjudgment and Cal expressing his self-deprecating view of romance.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning Tenderness and Deeper Feelings
sub_scenes.description: Nan questions the essence of love, leading to a deeper, metaphorical expression of Cal's feelings, moving beyond initial romantic notions.

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Nan's Resistance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc returns to the ghost town demolition, highlighting the progress and Nan's emotional confrontation with the destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Demolition Progress and Nan's Resistance
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the demolition site where workers discuss their progress, contrasting with Nan's visible distress and resistance to the destruction.

Major_Arcs.title: Father-Daughter Business Conflict and Humiliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Nan's conflict with her father over business and horses, leading to a heated argument and Nan's subsequent humiliation.

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Horses Discussion
sub_scenes.description: Nan interrupts her father's business meeting to discuss horses and a potential deal for construction work.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Refusal and Scolding
sub_scenes.description: Nan's father dismisses her ideas, refuses to help with horses, and scolds her for her 'nonsense'.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Maid's Comfort
sub_scenes.description: Nan, humiliated by her father's reprimand, retreats to her room and is comforted by a maid who offers stoic advice.

Major_Arcs.title: Mother's Comfort and Nan's Resolve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Nan seeking comfort from her mother and deciding to confront Cal to understand their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Comfort and Love Advice
sub_scenes.description: Nan's mother comforts her about love and relationships, advising patience and understanding with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Seek Clarity
sub_scenes.description: Nan resolves to seek direct clarification from Cal about their relationship, marking a shift to active decision-making.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit of Cal and Father's Business
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Nan's pursuit of Cal to have a crucial conversation, intersected by her father's business directives.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit of Cal
sub_scenes.description: Nan actively pursues Cal, running outdoors to catch up with him and initiate their conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Business Interruption
sub_scenes.description: Nan's pursuit is interrupted by her father, who gives her business instructions regarding horses and a deal, adding a layer of conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Conflict with Cal and His Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes Nan's confrontation with Cal, his defiant response, and his subsequent departure, leading to Nan's loneliness.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Cal's Defiance
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal about their relationship and the horses, leading to Cal's defiant assertion and escalating conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Departure and Nan's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Cal departs with the horses, confirming his defiance and leaving Nan to witness the consequence of his decision.

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: Nan experiences loneliness and reflects on Cal's absence, marking a shift to emotional consequence and reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Return and Confession
sub_scenes.description: After weeks of absence, Cal returns and confesses his feelings to Nan, offering a potential turning point in their relationship.

Major_Arcs.title: Reconciliation and Weather Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Nan and Cal's reconciliation and introduces the severe weather crisis that threatens the community.

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Apology and Weather Concerns
sub_scenes.description: Nan apologizes to Cal, and their conversation shifts to the dire weather conditions and dwindling supplies.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Dire Weather Report
sub_scenes.description: Characters arrive at Mr. Wills' house and receive alarming news about the unprecedented snowfall.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report

sub_scenes.title: Weather's Threat and Anxious Waiting
sub_scenes.description: Inside Mr. Wills' house, the conversation continues about the weather's threat to cattlemen, increasing anxiety about Cal and Dad.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Context of Snow
sub_scenes.description: Narrative text emphasizes the unprecedented severity of the snowfall, setting the stage for dire consequences.

narrative_arcs.title: Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Resolve to Act
sub_scenes.description: Cal resolves to take action to save the cattle from the impending starvation due to the severe snowstorm.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle

Major_Arcs.title: Hopelessness and Aerial Relief
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the community's despair due to the relentless snow and the sudden arrival of aerial relief, bringing hope.

sub_scenes.title: Hopelessness and Continuous Snow
sub_scenes.description: Characters indoors express despair and hopelessness as the snow continues relentlessly, threatening their livelihood.

sub_scenes.title: Sound of Hopeful Discovery
sub_scenes.description: The sound of a plane breaks the despair, bringing curiosity and a flicker of hope as characters investigate.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery

sub_scenes.title: Fodder from the Plane and Romance
sub_scenes.description: The plane drops fodder, bringing relief and joy, and sparking a discussion about romance and selfless acts.

narrative_arcs.title: Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Gossip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the town's varied reactions to his violent actions, setting up future conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's violent act in town sparks varied reactions, setting up debates about his character and heroism.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions

Major_Arcs.title: Sally, Jeff, and Clyde's Concerns about Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Sally and Clyde's worries about Jeff's fascination with violence and guns, stemming from his father's death.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Sally reflects on Jeff's past and his hero worship phase, while Clyde comments on Jeff's unhealthy focus on guns.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation over Dad's Gun
sub_scenes.description: Sally confronts Jeff about handling their father's gun, expressing concern about his growing fascination with violence.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult
sub_scenes.description: Jeff becomes defensive, compares himself to Clyde, and dismisses Clyde's profession, escalating his aggressive behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult

Major_Arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Escalating Worries About Jeff
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Sally and Clyde's increasing concern about Jeff's behavior, leading Sally to recall a troubling past incident.

sub_scenes.title: Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses her escalating fear about Jeff's temper and behavior to Clyde, fearing he is losing control.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
sub_scenes.description: Sally recalls a past incident where Jeff went missing, highlighting his long-standing heightened sense of danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice
sub_scenes.description: Sally introduces Mr. Benson, who offers potentially insincere and self-serving advice, while Sally remains worried.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Article Conflict and Benson's Calculated Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the conflict arising from Clyde's article criticizing Benson and Benson's calculated reaction to it.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation about the Article
sub_scenes.description: An angry woman confronts Clyde about his potentially damaging article, initiating the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Fear for Clyde's Safety
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses her fear to Clyde about Benson's violent reaction to the article and Clyde's dismissive attitude.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Calculated Response
sub_scenes.description: Benson, informed about the article, decides to stay in town to see what Clyde will write next, hinting at future conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Threats, Town Gossip, and Dinner Invitation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts escalating threats against Clyde, town gossip about the article, and a surprising dinner invitation for Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Threats and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: Fighting's Right Fine threatens Clyde, but Clyde remains defiant, while Sally fears Benson's violent reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Town Gossip and Article's Impact
sub_scenes.description: Jeff and Er discuss Clyde's article and its impact, with Er speculating about Clyde's motivations and potential truth.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation for Chane Benson
sub_scenes.description: Er suggests inviting Chane Benson to dinner, hoping to influence him towards a more reasonable outcome.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner, Manipulation, and Confrontation with Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the dinner with Benson, escalating tensions, revealing Benson's manipulative nature, and leading to a confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Moonlight Compliment
sub_scenes.description: The dinner scene is polite, followed by a moonlight conversation with Benson complimenting Sally, setting a deceptive tone.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Accusation of Er's Motives
sub_scenes.description: Jeff confronts Er, accusing him of ulterior motives for inviting Benson, revealing internal tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Chane's Threatening Revelation to Sally
sub_scenes.description: Benson reveals his true, menacing intentions to Sally, confirming his plan to harm Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Confrontation and Assault
sub_scenes.description: Jeff and Er's conflict intensifies as Benson assaults Sally, escalating the overall tension.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Angry Accusation and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: Sally confronts Benson with anger and disappointment, revealing her true motives for inviting him and condemning his actions.

Major_Arcs.title: Brother Reveal, Benson's Departure, and Jeff's Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in Sally revealing Benson is her brother, Benson's aggressive departure, and Jeff's determined pursuit to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Explanation and Brother Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Sally attempts to explain the situation to Jeff and reveals the shocking truth that Chane is her brother.

sub_scenes.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
sub_scenes.description: Benson confronts Jeff aggressively, asserting his dominance and anger at being touched by Jeff.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Rage, Departure, and Warning
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses rage as Benson leaves and warns Jeff about Benson's intention to harm Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Determined Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Jeff, spurred by Sally's warning, determinedly pursues Benson to save Clyde, starting a chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Er's Plea
sub_scenes.description: Jeff confronts Benson with a gun, but Er intervenes, urging for a non-violent resolution and a fair fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and Family Legacy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the conflict with Benson through a fistfight and emphasizes the family legacy of newspaper men.

sub_scenes.title: Fair Fight and Physical Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Jeff and Benson engage in a fistfight instead of a gunfight, as suggested by Er, resolving their dispute physically.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Explanation to Sis
sub_scenes.description: Jeff explains the situation involving Clyde to Sis, sharing information about recent events.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Headline Change and Relief
sub_scenes.description: Sally instructs Clyde to change the headline to indicate Benson's departure, bringing relief and closure.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change

sub_scenes.title: Office Discussion and Lessons Learned
sub_scenes.description: Sally and Jeff discuss the next newspaper edition and reflect on the strength of words when backed up.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

sub_scenes.title: Family Legacy of Newspaper Men
sub_scenes.description: Narrative text reflects on Jeff and Clyde's shared family legacy and values as newspaper men.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Conflicted Romance and Range War Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Betsy and Steve's developing romance amidst the threat of a range war and Betsy's firm leadership.

sub_scenes.title: Whip Fight and Introduction of Steve
sub_scenes.description: A whip fight introduces tension, followed by Betsy being introduced to Steve Daley, marking his arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble
sub_scenes.description: Betsy's established competence is acknowledged, but Steve's arrival is hinted to bring trouble to the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Sarcastic Offer and Skepticism
sub_scenes.description: Steve and Betsy's initial interaction is marked by sarcasm and Betsy's skepticism about Hank's judgment.

sub_scenes.title: Warning of Range War
sub_scenes.description: Hank warns Betsy about a potential range war, acknowledging the territorial dispute and risk of conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Advice and Caution Agreement
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Hank agree on the need for caution in handling the potential range war, valuing Betsy's experience.

sub_scenes.title: Offer of Ride and Refusal
sub_scenes.description: Steve offers Betsy a ride, which she politely refuses, asserting her independence and subtly rejecting his help.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Order
sub_scenes.description: Hank issues an order, indicating his authority and setting up Betsy's reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Dress Material and Betsy's Disregard
sub_scenes.description: Betsy expresses frustration at Hank disregarding her wishes, with Steve teasingly commenting on it.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Betsy confronts Fred Bridges, leading to a heated exchange and a physical fight, escalating the range war tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy realizes Steve is a hired gunslinger and decides to keep him as her bodyguard, acknowledging the need for a gunman.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy clarifies she doesn't want to fire Steve, hinting at a shift in her feelings and priorities regarding him.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion
sub_scenes.description: Hank expresses gratitude towards Steve, and Betsy suggests he thank Steve personally, leading to a resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Condition for Steve's Job
sub_scenes.description: Betsy sets a condition for Steve's job, demanding he stop wearing guns, creating a personal and professional conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Reaction and Betsy's Confession
sub_scenes.description: Steve accepts Betsy's condition, but Betsy then confesses she doesn't want him to leave, revealing her conflicted feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Gunslinger Identity
sub_scenes.description: Betsy expresses conflicted feelings about Steve's gunfighter identity, hinting at attraction and unease.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity

sub_scenes.title: Declaration of Love and Dilemma of Identity
sub_scenes.description: Betsy declares her love and asks Steve to give up his gun, but Steve reveals his gunfighter identity is integral to him.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Plea and Steve's Stance
sub_scenes.description: Betsy pleads, emphasizing her love, while Steve reiterates his commitment to his gunfighter identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy's deep love seems to sway Steve, who considers giving up his gun for her.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Affectionate Confirmation and Hope
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve confirm their affection, hinting at a hopeful future where Steve might abandon his gunfighter identity.

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Escalation and Betsy's Defiance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalation of the range war, Betsy's defiance, and the preparations for armed conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Impending Trouble and Betsy's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Trouble looms as Betsy threatens someone for trespassing, indicating an escalating range war conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Confrontation and Demands
sub_scenes.description: Betsy confronts Steve and 'Yuh, Betsy!', accusing them of takeover plans and issuing an ultimatum with threats.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Defense and Counter-Argument
sub_scenes.description: Steve defends their actions and attempts to reason with Betsy, questioning her angry reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity
sub_scenes.description: Narrative text reflects on past conflicts and the established norm of armed conflict in their world.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Defiance and Justification
sub_scenes.description: Betsy asserts her authority, forbids others from carrying guns for a gunfight, and justifies her stance based on Bridges' words.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Regret and Retrospective Understanding
sub_scenes.description: Steve reflects on his past mistakes and expresses confusion and concern about recent events and Hank's absence.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy's Plea, Hank's Resolve, and Journey to Devil's Pass
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Betsy's plea to Hank, his resolute decision to engage in violence, and their journey towards Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Plea and Hank's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy pleads with Hank not to go, but Hank declares his resolve to get his guns, motivated by Betsy's actions.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Agreement
sub_scenes.description: Betsy justifies violence, and Steve reluctantly agrees to proceed with armed conflict because of her stance.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Internal Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Betsy reflects internally on her decisions and worries about judgment from Hank and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: The narrative describes their silent journey to Devil's Pass, where they anticipate conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Steve's Survival
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the confrontation at Devil's Pass, the captivity and implied harm of someone, and Betsy and Steve's survival and gratitude.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Upon arrival at Devil's Pass, Betsy is confronted and accused regarding their presence and a past killing.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

sub_scenes.title: Argument over Releasing Captive
sub_scenes.description: A heated argument erupts about releasing a captive, culminating in implied harm to the captive.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Recovery and Steve's Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Betsy recovers from fainting, and Steve expresses his gratitude for being alive, relieved and thankful.

sub_scenes.title: Affection and Future Together
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve share tender affection and plan a future together, resolving the immediate danger and tension.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Dave's Budding Romance vs. Range Trouble
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts Carrie and Dave's budding romance with the emerging conflict of range trouble and territorial disputes.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave
sub_scenes.description: A woman instructs a man to leave 'Dave' alone, implying a personal conflict and romantic tension.

sub_scenes.title: Curley's Arrival and Range Trouble
sub_scenes.description: Curley's arrival at the ranch brings news of range trouble, shifting focus to territorial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation at Fence Line
sub_scenes.description: Ranchers confront Fred Gordon at a newly built fence, leading to a tense exchange and potential violence.

sub_scenes.title: Escalation and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Tensions escalate at the fence line, leading to a near-violent incident and intervention by the Rancher's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: After the standoff, characters apologize and reassure each other, attempting to de-escalate the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Reflections and Budding Romance
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave reflect on recent events, and a budding romance develops between them amidst the lingering tension.

sub_scenes.title: Fred Gordon's Ominous Reappearance
sub_scenes.description: Fred Gordon's sudden reappearance injects tension back into the peaceful moment between Carrie and Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Assertive Response
sub_scenes.description: Carrie responds assertively to Fred's insinuations, defending her right to talk to Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession
sub_scenes.description: Dave supports Carrie, and Carrie confesses her past feelings for Fred and current affection for Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Reflections and Romantic Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Carrie reflects on her past feelings for Fred and her current relationship with Dave, culminating in Dave's marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Strategic Proposition
sub_scenes.description: Fred proposes a business strategy to Carrie, focusing on the Carlton contract, initiating a new conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Selfish Motives and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Fred reveals his selfish motives behind the contract proposition, betraying Carrie's trust and shocking her.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Carrie angrily confronts and rejects Fred, disgusted by his manipulation and self-interest.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Determined Plan
sub_scenes.description: Carrie resolves to fight back against Fred's manipulation and plans to confront Mr. Carlton.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave confront Fred, with Dave's unexpected arrival adding complexity to the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Confrontation with Mr. Carlton
sub_scenes.description: Carrie confronts Mr. Carlton about his deceitful business practices, asserting her independence.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Carrie's Triumph
sub_scenes.description: Carrie emerges victorious from her meeting with Mr. Carlton, achieving triumph over Fred's scheme.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie's Rejection of Fred and Distant Reunion with Dave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Carrie's firm rejection of Fred and a distant, emotionally complex reunion with Dave after weeks of separation.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Declaration and Fred's Ousting
sub_scenes.description: Carrie decisively rejects Fred, asserting her control and dismissing his claims and presence.

sub_scenes.title: Chance Encounter and Distant Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Weeks later, Carrie and Dave meet in town, their reunion marked by distance and changed dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Reflections and Confessions in Town
sub_scenes.description: Carrie confesses her love for Fred to Dave, leading to Dave's abrupt departure and heightened emotional tension.

sub_scenes.title: Ride Back and Unspoken Feelings
sub_scenes.description: During their ride back, Dave urges Carrie to reconcile with Fred, revealing his own complex and proud feelings.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie's Ailment, Confession, and Dave's Proposal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Carrie's emotional distress leading to illness, Dave's pragmatic advice, and ultimately, a romantic proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Ailment and Concerned Visitors
sub_scenes.description: Carrie's illness draws concern, with her father, Mr. Carlton, and Dave visiting her bedside.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Revelation of Fred's Actions
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Carlton reveals Fred's genuine concern for Carrie, correcting past misinterpretations of Fred's motives.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Account and Carrie's Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Carlton and Carrie's father recount Fred's visit and Carrie's rejection, highlighting a crucial misunderstanding.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: Dave directly questions Carrie, leading to her explicit confession of love for Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Dismissal and Carrie's Regret
sub_scenes.description: Dave abruptly leaves after Carrie's confession, and Carrie expresses regret for her past actions.

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Turmoil
sub_scenes.description: Dave offers pragmatic advice about Fred, contrasting with Carrie's deep emotional reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Dave persists in his persuasion, leading to Carrie's emotional plea for a kiss, indicating a potential shift.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

sub_scenes.title: The Embrace and the Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Dave and Carrie embrace and kiss, marking a significant romantic development in their relationship.

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Injury, Pursuit, and Chris and Rance's Love
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's injury, the pursuit by the Marshal, and the unexpected romantic development between Chris and Rance amidst the danger.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Arrival and Cryptic Words
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives injured, speaking cryptically about being 'done', hinting at a serious situation.

sub_scenes.title: The Bullet Wound Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's injury is revealed to be a bullet wound, confirming the serious nature of his situation.

sub_scenes.title: Concern and Inquiry about Dirk
sub_scenes.description: Characters discuss Dirk's potential involvement in a fight and express concern, initiating an investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch
sub_scenes.description: Marshals arrive at a ranch, questioning a woman about Dirk, initiating a pursuit narrative.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Claim and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The Marshals confront the woman, challenging her claim to the ranch and hinting at a related crime.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Confrontation and Justification
sub_scenes.description: Marshals confront the woman inside a room with an injured man, justifying potential violence against Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Law vs. Justice Argument
sub_scenes.description: Marshals and the woman debate law versus justice regarding Dirk, with the woman prioritizing Dirk's well-being.

sub_scenes.title: Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
sub_scenes.description: Marshal shifts his stance, agreeing to a temporary truce and allowing the woman to care for Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Reflection on Feelings
sub_scenes.description: The woman reflects on her developing romantic feelings for Dirk during his convalescence.

sub_scenes.title: Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The relationship between Marshal and woman evolves during a night encounter, showing softened emotions and mutual understanding.

narrative_arcs.title: Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Embrace, and Realization
sub_scenes.description: The woman confesses her love to the Marshal, leading to an embrace and her realization about misjudging his feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Separation and Chris's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal suggests leaving Dirk, creating a dilemma for Chris who ultimately chooses loyalty to her brother.

sub_scenes.title: Realization of Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Chris realize they are being pursued, shifting the narrative to a chase sequence.

sub_scenes.title: Retrospective on Evasion Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Narrative flashback explains their failed evasion attempts and the Marshal's ambush in the morning.

narrative_arcs.title: Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal confronts Dirk, leading to a gunfight where Chris is tragically shot.

sub_scenes.title: Immediate Aftermath and Moral Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Immediate aftermath of the gunfight, with Chris injured and Dirk facing a moral dilemma about the wounded Marshal.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Rance argue about the ethics of killing the wounded Marshal, highlighting their differing moral stances.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Leave Marshal and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: Dirk decides against killing the Marshal, and Rance reflects on Dirk's motivations and a shift in her perception.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Leave the Marshal and Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Chris say goodbye, with Chris accusing Dirk of aiding a criminal's escape, highlighting their conflicting loyalties.

sub_scenes.title: Confession and Conflicting Loyalties
sub_scenes.description: Chris declares her intention to return to the Marshal and confesses her love for Dirk, revealing her internal conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Loving Reflection
sub_scenes.description: Rance reflects on her deep love for Dirk despite his wrongdoings, justifying her return to him.

sub_scenes.title: Concern and Confused State
sub_scenes.description: Rance worries about Dirk's injury and his confused state, showing her deep concern for him.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution in Mexico
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Rance successfully escape to Mexico, resolving the pursuit and danger.

Major_Arcs.title: Rance and Chris's Romance and Wedding Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with Rance and Chris's reunion, romantic resolution, and their wedding, resolving their personal storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Unconscious Rance
sub_scenes.description: A woman discovers Rance unconscious, initiating a new phase of concern for his well-being.

sub_scenes.title: Waking Up and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Rance wakes up at the ranch, reassured by Chris and her father about his safety and care.

sub_scenes.title: Concern and Sleeplessness
sub_scenes.description: Chris and Rance express mutual concern and sleeplessness during their separation and ordeal, highlighting their affection.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Departure and Hinted Business
sub_scenes.description: Chris's father leaves them alone, hinting at unresolved 'business' related to Dirk's escape and their involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Discussion of 'Business' and Responsibility
sub_scenes.description: Rance clarifies the 'business' as related to the father's sense of responsibility for Dirk's escape.

sub_scenes.title: Rejection of Punishment and Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Chris rejects the idea of punishment, expressing gratitude and affection towards Rance.

sub_scenes.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease
sub_scenes.description: Chris confesses her love for Rance, leading to a romantic atmosphere and anticipation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease

sub_scenes.title: Marriage Proposal and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: Rance proposes marriage to Chris, culminating in a kiss and resolving their romantic arc.

sub_scenes.title: Bride's Pre-Wedding Thoughts
sub_scenes.description: The bride reflects on her relationship with Rance and lingering tensions about Dirk before her wedding.

sub_scenes.title: Continued Reflection and Fear
sub_scenes.description: Bride continues her internal monologue, expressing love, fear of Dirk's return, and anxieties about their happiness.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Ceremony Begins
sub_scenes.description: The wedding ceremony is set to begin, with the bride's father prompting her and mentioning waiting guests.

sub_scenes.title: Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: The wedding ceremony progresses as the bride walks down the aisle, but Dirk's dramatic arrival interrupts it.

narrative_arcs.title: Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Dirk
sub_scenes.description: Dirk confronts the bride's father upon his dramatic arrival, disrupting the wedding ceremony.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Calm Reaction and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Rance reacts calmly to Dirk's arrival, warning Dirk not to return and threatening to disarm him.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Reassurance and Calm Down
sub_scenes.description: The bride's father intervenes, attempting to de-escalate the situation and prevent violence.

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Story and Gift
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal tells a story about his past encounter with Dirk and the wedding gift he prepared.

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal presents Dirk's guns as a wedding gift and reveals Dirk's ambiguous but ultimately free fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
sub_scenes.description: Final narrative remarks conclude Dirk's storyline and subtly shift focus back to Rance and his personal taste, ending the narrative.

narrative_arcs.title: Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
